name: DON'T TOUCH THE BUTTON MR.PRESIDENT
description:
You are the president and the national security minister saids to you that you musn't touch the red button. Your goal is press the button without get catch by the national security minister. Other important thin is that if you don't pres the button you get bored and come back to work, and anybody espects thatbut it isn't the goal. use the space bar to interact with everithing.
